entries.name: Expert Forgery
entries: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork.

entries.name: Kenku Training
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice from Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth, or Sleight of Hand.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can mimic any sounds you have heard.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can read and write Common and Auran but speak only by mimicking sounds you have heard.
